name: Learning Unity Challenge Week 4-8: Regicide! - Medieval Combat
name_original: Learning Unity Challenge Week 4-8: Regicide! - Medieval Combat
description:
This is a quick showcase of a game I made in a few weeks to assist in teaching me how to use the Unity3D engine. Fight off waves of enemies with various different weapons with vastly different stats. 

Controls:

Movement - WASD, Shift to sprint, watch your stamina!

Attack - Left Mouse(Slash), Right Mouse(Stab)

Parry - Block attacks with (Q)
